title: I was almost Sex Trafficked.. A Story of Survival ft. Chandler Hatchett
description:
Happy Tuesday everyone! 

Today's episode is going to be about a sensitive topic that needs to be spoken about. Chandler Hatchet will be sharing her story of the time she was nearly sex trafficked. We will be talking about her experience and how she has taken action to bring more attention to this billion-dollar problem. Listen to learn about detecting the signs, taking precautions, and more. 


Resources mentioned:

A24: https://instagram.com/a21?igshid=184jvbfglf8by

Bochy Box: https://instagram.com/bochysbox?igshid=75tl2yga9ev1

International justice system: https://www.amnesty.org/en/what-we-do/international-justice/

Operation Underground railroads: https://ourrescue.org/

Exodus cry: https://exoduscry.com/


Leave us a review!

Want to send Jeanine a message? You can do that here: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy by clicking "Message." 


Follow us on Instagram!

Happy and Healthy: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/

Jeanine: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/

Chandler: https://www.instagram.com/chandler.hatchett/ 


Watch this episode here: https://youtu.be/A32cUZXqSIM


You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.
